title: Chest (Isle of Souls Dungeon)

properties.name: description
properties.value: The chest is a thievable chest in the Isle of Souls Dungeon that requires level 28 Thieving to steal from. Each chest yields 150 experience, and the chest's loot respawns instantly. This chest is the sole source of dark keys, which are used to loot the Dark Chest in the Crumbling Tower basement. It is possible to trigger a trap and get teleported out of the dungeon.

content:
Chest
Released3 February 2021 (Update)
MembersYes
QuestNo
LocationIsle of Souls Dungeon
ExamineI wonder what's inside it.
Map
Advanced data
Object ID40739

The chest is a thievable chest in the Isle of Souls Dungeon that requires level 28 Thieving to steal from. Each chest yields 150 experience, and the chest's loot respawns instantly. This chest is the sole source of dark keys, which are used to loot the Dark Chest in the Crumbling Tower basement. It is possible to trigger a trap and get teleported out of the dungeon.

In order to save inventory space when looting the chest, it is recommended to bring a gem bag and herb sack.

Contents

  • 1 Thieving info
    • 1.1 Success chance
  • 2 Loot
  • 3 References

Thieving info[edit | edit source]

Chest (Isle of Souls Dungeon)
Level required 28
Thieving XP150 xp
TypeChest
ToolLockpick can be used to help

Success chance[edit | edit source]

The chance of successfully opening the soul chest is -9% at level 1, and 60% at level 99, interpolating linearly in between. Carrying a lockpick increases the rate of success.[1]

If players fail to loot the chest, there is a 1 in 6 chance[2] to get teleported north-east of the dungeon entrance.
